template.name: session_che
template.value: proxies = { 'http': "http://bc-cls03.ccla.com.au:3128", 'https': "http://bc-cls03.ccla.com.au:3128", } session = requests.Session() session.proxies = proxies conn = session.get(url) return conn
template.description: begin a requests session with che proxies

template.name: pip_install_che
template.value: pip install --trusted-host pypi.python.org --trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org --trusted-host pypi.org --proxy http://bc-cls03.ccla.com.au:3128 <package_name>
template.description: the pip install line for chep

template.name: mssql_conn_string_che
template.value: def sqlalchemy_conn_string(dsn="test_scotty", uid="chepdata", pwd="chep2016DATA"): conn_str = f"mssql+pyodbc://{uid}:{pwd}@{dsn}" logging.debug(f"createed conn_string of {conn_str}") return conn_str
template.description: function to create the odbc connection string for che
